title: Sketch Class: The Figure
description:
Six Thursdays:
September 7-October 12
5:30pm-7:30pm

Multi-session sketch classes offer the chance to draw in the museum's galleries under the guidance of experienced instructors. All materials will be provided.

Participants will look at artwork from around the world and through history to discover and be inspired by different ways of representing the human form.

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu. Classes are recommended for ages 16 and up.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
